ygData.subject: Tattered gnomish cloack....
ygData.msgSnippet: This is the only item we need for the thermal cloak as i see it, but you already knew that. Ok i was reviewing the log for anything on this subject. In a
ygData.messageBody:
This is the only item we need for the thermal cloak as i see it, but
you already knew that. Ok i was reviewing the log for anything on this
subject. In a previous digest it was said that tattered gnomish armor
is in a quest for warriors. We have to find red 5 and give the black
to manik compoltn a warrior dude in the hallway that we take going
to the bank. Red 5 can be found in the scrapyard ( one level down).
Has anyone completed this quest and if so what were the results?
btw spyglass is trivial at 68 skill just in case anyone out there was
wondering hehee. If u have any info on this please post it

PS and enough of this off topic crap we are tinkerers lets discuss
tinkering instead of enchanter stuff.... i like enchanters and all
but they should get their own messeage board:)

Grundup Puddlejumper of tallon
